failed-new.title: Something Went Wrong
failed-new.message: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.

failed.title: Something Went Wrong
failed.message: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.message: Oops! The page you're looking for doesn't exist or may have been moved. Please check the URL or try again.

noContent.title: No Content Available
noContent.message: There's nothing to display here at the moment. Please check back later.

timeout.title: Request Timed Out
timeout.message: The request took too long to complete. Please check your connection and try again.

connectionError.title: Connection Issue
connectionError.message: Unable to connect to the internet. Please check your connection and try again.

internalServerError.title: Server Error
internalServerError.message: We're experiencing technical difficulties. Please try again later.

emptyBills.title: No Bills Available
emptyBills.message: You have no bills to display at the moment. Check back later or refresh.

emptyPromotions.title: No Promotions Available
emptyPromotions.message: You have no promotions to display at the moment. Check back later or refresh.

emptyNotifications.title: No Notifications Yet
emptyNotifications.message: You're all caught up! We'll notify you when there's something new.

emptyReviews.title: No Reviews Available
emptyReviews.message: There are no reviews for this item yet. Be the first to share your experience!

emptyTransactions.title: No Transactions Found
emptyTransactions.message: You have no transactions to display at the moment. Try making a transaction or refresh to check

issueSubmitted.message: Our support team will get back to you soon. Youâ€™ll receive a response shortly.

feedbackSubmitted.message: Thank you for your feedback. We appreciate your time and effort.

profileUpdated.title: Profile Updated Successfully!
profileUpdated.message: Your profile details have been updated. You can continue using the app or go back.

eBillRegistered.title: E-Bill Registration Successful!
eBillRegistered.message: You have successfully registered for e-billing. You can now enjoy a hassle-free billing experience. You can return to the home screen now.
